title: Claude Grasland
text:
Claude Grasland is professor of geography at University Paris Cité and member of research team Géographie-cités.

title: Index
text: This website propose different sources of geometries for the description of our contemporary world from 1945 to present. It purpose is to propose methods of conversion from one geometry top another one which is not necessary obvious.
